snippet: The country’s largest guerrilla group released two police officers it had taken captive in an action that appeared to have briefly threatened the group’s peace talks with the government.
abstract: Rebel group Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia releases two police officers taken captive in action that briefly threatened group’s peace talks with government.
lead_paragraph: The country’s largest guerrilla group released two police officers it had taken captive in an action that appeared to have briefly threatened the group’s peace talks with the government.
